data.name: Mafia III: Faster, Baby!
data.detailed_description:
In Sinclair Parish, a rural town west of the Bayou, Sheriff “Slim” Beaumont rules on a platform of fear and violence. When a Civil Rights leader is murdered, and other activists are targeted, Lincoln joins forces with sister-in-arms Roxy Laveau on an explosive mission to expose the town’s corrupt underbelly. Engage in high-octane car chases, epic new military-grade combat tactics and seedy operations to bring Slim and his corrupt Sheriff’s Department to justice.

SINCLAIR PARISH:

An all-new township west of the Bayou run by corrupt law enforcement dedicated to enforcing their way of life through fear and violence. Expansive and varied terrain sets the stage for epic car chases and all-new combat tactics.

A NEW PLOT OF FAMILY, BETRAYAL, AND REVENGE:

Partner with local activist Roxy Laveau to avenge the murder of a prominent Civil Rights leader and bring Sheriff “Slim” Beaumont and his gang of corruption to justice.

REDEFINE YOUR REVENGE STRATEGY:

Expanded stunt driving and combat mechanics, new vehicles and weapons add all new opportunities to engage enemies behind-the-wheel and on foot.

EPIC REWARDS:

Unlock unique Faster, Baby! rewards to further personalize your path to revenge. Equip Roxy’s MK 1020, a silenced SMG that spits hellfire. Put the pedal down in Roxy’s sporty Lassiter Nightcrawler, made for the chase. Plus, get access to the Blue Genius and The Experience outfits, and more!

Faster, Baby! is part of the Season Pass.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500K, AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of Video Memory & NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compliant Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Windows 8.1 users may need additional windows Update files: Please Click here for information
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770, AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB of Video Memory & NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compliant Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.12.4
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (4 Cores) 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M290X 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
    NOTICE: NVIDIA and INTEL video cards are NOT SUPPORTED to run Mafia III Mac
    NOTICE: The game requires a minimum 2GB AMD video card. These are the ONLY supported Mac models: AMD FirePro D300, dual AMD FirePro D500, or dual AMD FirePro D700 (late 2013 MacPro) AMD Radeon R9 M290X or Radeon R9 M295X (late 2014 iMac) AMD Radeon R9 M380, M390, M395, or M395X (late 2015 iMac) AMD Radeon R9 M370X (mid 2015 and 2016 MBP) AMD Radeon Pro 450, 455, or 460 (late 2016 MBP)
    NOTICE: This game is not supported on volumes formatted as Mac OS Extended (CaseSensitive)
